md:
giải nghĩa từ "brigade" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Brigade (noun) - Đội, Đơn vị

+ Meaning: A group of people who work together to achieve a common goal or objective.

+ Example sentence: The fire brigade responded quickly to the emergency call.

+ Related words: team, squad, unit, corps.

* Brigade (verb) - Tổ chức thành đội

+ Meaning: To organize or form people into a group to work together.

+ Example sentence: The company brigaded its employees into teams to complete the project.

+ Related words: organize, assemble, form, unite.

Note: The verb form of "brigade" is less common than the noun form.
